page.title: 12FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Most of the people who live in Cranwell village have lived there for more than two years, this is because they are not posted, unlike the families living on the air force base. The people in R.A.F. Cranwell have often been posted to Britain from other countries. People living on the base have come from places in Germany, America, Cyprus and other air force bases abroad. Some families are of a different nationality, there are Germans, Americans, Swiss and other nationalities, including some from as far away as New Zealand.
